description: CSS file containing theme management variables and styles for the App component of a frontend application, including light and dark theme specifications.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application container that centers its content with a background color determined by the theme.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header section of the App component that includes styling for layout and theming.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styling for links within the App component, including color transitions based on the theme.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Button for toggling between light and dark themes, with transition effects and responsive design.
